      imageText - list of image alternate text

    • getNewsBySource

      @Transactional org.springframework.data.domain.Page<News> getNewsBySource(String source, PageFilter filter)
      this method used to get all news that match news source in pagination format
      Parameters:
      source - source of news e.g. Thairath, Sanook, Dek-D
      filter - a page filter that have attribute page number (page) and amount of element in a page (size)
      Returns:
      list of news that match by source in pagination format

    • searchNews

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<News> searchNews(String title, PageFilter filter)
      this method used to get all news that contain query (title) and return it in pagination format
      Parameters:
      title - query for news searching
      filter - a page filter that have attribute page number (page) and amount of element in a page (size)
      Returns:
      list of news that contain a title in pagination format
